text: Charles Marc Hervé Perceval Leclerc (French pronunciation: [ʃaʁl ləklɛʁ]; born 16 October 1997) is a Monégasque racing driver, currently competing in Formula One for Ferrari. Leclerc finished 2nd in the Formula One World Drivers' Championship in 2022 with Ferrari, and has won eight Grands Prix in seven seasons. Goat of the modern day era, will probably get the 2025 WDC. == Racing record == === Wins === * 2019 Belgian Grand Prix (Spa-Francorchamps) * 2019 Monza Grand Prix (Monza) * 2022 Bahrain Grand Prix (as-Sachir) * 2022 Australian Grand Prix (Melbourne) * 2022 Austrian Grand Prix (Spielberg) * 2024 Monaco Grand Prix (Monte Carlo) * 2024 Italian Grand Prix (Monza) * 2024 United States Grand Prix (Austin) === Racing career summary === Season Series Team Races Wins Poles Podiums Points Position 2014 Formula Renault 2.0 Alps Fortec Motorsports 14 2 1 0 7 199 2nd 2014 Eurocup Formula Renault 2.0 6 0 0 0 3 0 NC† 2015 FIA Formula 3 European Championship Van Amersfoort Racing 33 4 3 5 13 363.5 4th 2015 Macau Grand Prix 1 0 0 0 1 N/A 2nd 2016 GP3 Series ART Grand Prix 18 3 4 4 8 202 1st 2017 Formula 2 Prema Racing 22 7 8 4 10 282 1st 2018 Formula One Alfa Romeo Sauber F1 Team 21 0 0 0 0 39 13th 2019 Formula One Scuderia Ferrari Mission Winnow 21 2 7 4 10 264 4th 2020 Formula One Scuderia Ferrari Mission Winnow 17 0 0 0 2 98 8th 2021 Formula One Scuderia Ferrari Mission Winnow 22 0 2 0 1 159 7th 2022 Formula One Scuderia Ferrari 22 3 9 3 11 308 2nd 2023 Formula One Scuderia Ferrari 22 0 5 0 6 206 5th 2024 Formula One Scuderia Ferrari 24 3 3 3 13 356 3rd 2025 Formula One Scuderia Ferrari 7 0 0 0 1 61* 5th* Source: As Leclerc was a guest driver, he was ineligible for championship points.
